attributes.additional_details: Abolish the Welsh & Scottish assemblies and restore and unify the United Kingdom under one parliament and take away power and responsibilities from these tin pot dictators
attributes.background: Stop wasting tax payers money on these unnecessary none entities

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for the people of Scotland and Wales.

You could start a petition calling for referendums to take place on the future of the devolved assemblies.
